data.eml:eml: Northern Apennines as centre of speciation: a new Verdanus species group (Hemiptera, Cicadomorpha, Cicadellidae) from Italy and its phylogenetic relationships with V. bensoni and the V. limbatellus group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guglielmino, Adalgisa, Bückle, Christoph (2009): Northern Apennines as centre of speciation: a new Verdanus species group (Hemiptera, Cicadomorpha, Cicadellidae) from Italy and its phylogenetic relationships with V. bensoni and the V. limbatellus group. Zootaxa 2264: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190799
